# uptimekuma_notification_pushbullet (Resource)

Pushbullet notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_pushbullet" "example" {
  name         = "My Pushbullet Notification"
  is_active    = true
  access_token = var.pushbullet_access_token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `access_token` (String, Sensitive) Pushbullet access token
- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
